query: SELECT partytype, contractorname, contractdescription, date_trunc_ym(contractdate) AS month, COUNT(*) AS count WHERE contractdate >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY partytype, contractorname, contractdescription, month ORDER BY month, partytype, contractorname

contractorname.description: Name of the contractor awarded the contract

contractdescription.description: Short description of the nature of the contract

table_metadata.title: SFEC Form 126f4 - Notification of Contract Approval - Affiliates and Subcontractors
table_metadata.description: This dataset includes information about the approval of contracts valued at $100,000 or more by City elective officers.
